title: Rebuild site to restore visible images and replace website icon with newly uploaded image

requirements.text: Generate a new set of brand icon assets from the newly uploaded image `download-2.webp` and use them consistently across the site (favicon in `frontend/index.html`, and the header/footer logo image in `frontend/src/App.tsx`).

quotes: now use this image as website icon

acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/index.html` references the new generated favicon (32x32) and apple-touch-icon (180x180) under `/assets/generated/`.
Header and footer in `frontend/src/App.tsx` use the new generated square brand icon under `/assets/generated/`.
All user-facing text remains in English.

requirements.text: Fix the issue where images are not visible by ensuring all image assets referenced in the React app exist in the deployed build and are referenced via URL-safe paths (no broken image links in hero or section galleries).

quotes: re upload these according to your knowledge making website interesting and effective , now use this image as website icon

acceptanceCriteria: In the deployed site, the hero background image renders and the service-section galleries render without broken images.
Image URLs used by the app are URL-safe and load correctly in production hosting (e.g., avoid unencoded spaces in public asset paths).
If any optional images are missing at runtime, the UI degrades gracefully (no layout break), and missing images are not shown as broken thumbnails.

requirements.text: Rebuild/redeploy the site so that the public link resolves successfully (no â€œCanister ID Not Resolvedâ€ error) and the latest assets (including the new icon images) are served.

acceptanceCriteria: The primary public URL for the site loads the SPA successfully in both mobile and desktop browsers without â€œCanister ID Not Resolvedâ€.

constraints: Frontend immutable paths must not be edited: `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts`, `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx`, `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts`, `frontend/src/main.tsx`, `frontend/src/components/ui`.
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor in `backend/main.mo`; only add `backend/migration.mo` if state migration is required.
nonGoals: Adding new authentication providers (only Internet Identity supported).
Adding new backend features (the backend is currently unused and may remain unchanged).

edits: Enhance/crop to a clean square brand mark with improved contrast and legibility (download-2.webp > bmc-icon.dim_512x512.png)
Create favicon from the same source (download-2.webp > favicon-32.dim_32x32.png)
Create Apple touch icon from the same source (download-2.webp > apple-touch-icon.dim_180x180.png)
